DOC.brief_summary: Tolerability, efficacy and handling of Berodual® Respimat® 20/50µg/dose solution for inhalation in patients with chronic obstructive airways disease in daily practice
DOC.brief_title: Berodual® Respimat® Solution for Inhalation in Patients With Chronic Obstructive Airways Disease
DOC.criteria: Men and women presenting with symptoms of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease Both previously untreated patients and patients treated previously with Berodual® or with other antiobstructive respiratory tract agents may be included Patients presenting with the general and specific contraindications listed in the Patient Information Leaflet and the Basic Product Information
